text: Benj Pasek (born June 9, 1985) is an American composer and lyricist. He is best known for writing songs for movies such as La La Land (2016) and The Greatest Showman (2017), and the Broadway musical Dear Evan Hansen. He is known for writing songs with Justin Paul. They also wrote songs for the Hulu show Only Murders in the Building. With Paul, Pasek became the 20th/21st person to win the EGOT, which is for someone who has won the Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony Awards. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Best Original Song Academy Award-winning songwriters Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:American Emmy Award winners Category:Golden Globe Award winning writers Category:Tony Award winners Category:Satellite Award winners Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American composers Category:Writers from Philadelphia Category:Singers from Philadelphia
